name: Kimco Realty Corp.
description: Kimco Realty Corp. is a leading owner and operator of open-air shopping centers and mixed-use properties in North America. Founded in 1989, the company focuses on creating vibrant retail environments that foster community engagement and economic growth. Kimco's portfolio comprises over 400 properties, primarily in the United States and Canada, with a diverse mix of tenants, including major national retailers, grocery stores, and local businesses. The company's strategic approach includes enhancing the customer experience through thoughtful property design and innovative leasing strategies. In recent years, Kimco has embraced sustainability initiatives, investing in energy-efficient technologies and environmentally friendly practices to minimize its carbon footprint. As a publicly traded Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT), Kimco prioritizes delivering value to its shareholders while also contributing positively to the communities it serves. The company is committed to adapting its business model to meet evolving consumer preferences, including the integration of e-commerce solutions and the development of mixed-use spaces that blend retail, residential, and office environments. With a focus on long-term growth, Kimco Realty is well-positioned to navigate the challenges of the retail landscape and continue its legacy of excellence in real estate.
headquarters: New Hyde Park, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Kimco Realty Corp. | Leading Owner and Operator of Retail Properties
seo.meta_description: Explore Kimco Realty Corp., a top REIT specializing in open-air shopping centers. Learn about our commitment to sustainability and community engagement.

faq.answer: Kimco Realty is headquartered in New Hyde Park, New York, USA.

faq.answer: Kimco Realty manages shopping centers and mixed-use developments.
